name: Sweet Alliance
description:
Sweet Alliance is a local multiplayer cooperative game where you have to protect the Cake from the hungry sweets. However, it won´t be easy because each player controls the movement of his wagon and the cannon of the other.

This game was made for Global StartupCities GameJam by Blue Magma team.

Game Designers:

  • Guillermo Grijalvo Muñoz: https://demoniacuss.itch.io
  • Francisco Manuel Balcázar Soto: https://frbalcaz.itch.io
  • Javier Benítez Milán: https://orolobo.itch.io

Game Programmers:

  • José Luis "Tote" Gómez Antón: https://jlga10.itch.io
  • Javier "Rickors" Morel Vera: https://javimorel.itch.io
  • Diego Romero Santos: https://majestic511.itch.io
  • David "Davre" Real Ortega: https://davre.itch.io
